trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Glendale
There were no other sightings in Glendale on or around May 31st 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMy fiance was looking up at the moon and noticed two white orb like objects under the moon very high in the sky, we speculated that maybe it was weather balloons and continued to watch the white orb, they slowly moved north east. We grabbed the binoculars and were still unable to make out what they were. We continued to watch them as they slowly traveled east. One disappeared and then a red diamond fluttery type of object appeared closer above us and appeared to be moving straight up above me. My daughter saw one flash west across the sky and disappear. She described it well as a crystal diamond, spiky thing, it was sparkling and changing colors. Very bizarre we have never seen anything like it. My daughters friend just called and reported seeing two red flashes in the sky as well.
Summary: White blimp like and red diamond that fluttered.
